sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Shows the menu bar in the selected window.
sections.mdown_content: Shows the menu bar in the selected window.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.ShowMenuBar, not by calling ShowMenuBar.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.ShowMenuBar**, not by calling **ShowMenuBar**.
